Review Text: What a rip off! After all the positive reviews I saw here I figured I'd give it a try. For ‚Ç¨21,- these two sandwiches are ridiculous. Bread doesn't taste fresh, the "schnitzel* on the pork katsu is very average and the sandwiches are very small. Will never come back here again...

Had an amazing dinner here the other night. Every dish is well presented and was surprising, be it in taste or presentation.
I particularly loved the dry-aged sea-bass and the potato dessert. ‚Ä¶
The service was amazing and the staff is really knowledgable about the food and the wine. ‚Ä¶

Coffee‚Äôs great, though they do not do iced ones. Cinnamon rolls are the Swedish kind and perfect (though not warm). ‚Ä¶

Always a great experience here. The food will challenge your taste buds, but you will never with anything but a smile on your face and a full belly. Great food with excellent wine pairings backed by an amazing sommelier  and knowledgeable staff  who are more than happy to answer any questions and guide you on your tasting journey.

Incredible dining experience. I loved every single aspect: the food, the wait staff, the chefs. The menu offers an interesting take on traditional Portuguese dishes. Five courses for under 50‚Ç¨. And, of course, the bread is amazing.

I ate here solo during the November 2021 partial lockdown when they were offering an a la carte menu. What an amazing place. Innovative and delicious food, an incredible wine list with really interesting by the glass options, a ‚Ä¶

We had lunch in this restaurant outside the center of Amsterdam. It‚Äôs a fusion style cuisine with asiatic influences. We tried all sharing degustation plates and everything was special and delicious. We‚Äôll definitely come back for a diner experience.

4850 is simply astounding, it is my go-to place whenever I want the best (and I go there often :D). It boasts an impressive wine collection, top-quality coffee, inspiring food, and the sort of vibe that makes me want to spend all day there contemplating the greatness of food and drink. Plus, the staff are all quite unique!

Top restaurant with a swift knowlegable staff, good service and fine menu (diner choice of 4,5 or 6 course) at a good price. 6 course is pretty much though. Very nice selection of wines by the glass. Good accoustics. Real treat for the city and yourself ...

Came here on Sunday afternoon brunch, feeling jaded after a boozey weekend. This was exactly what I needed. Really nice coffee, small but delicious brunch menu, ultra laid back chilled vibe. Service was very professional. Definitely want to go back and try the evening set menu!

This place is a gem! I've had brunch here twice and will continue to come back.  The service is excellent,  coffee divine,  cinnamon buns incredible,  and atmosphere pleasant.  I really enjoy my time here sitting reading a book while my dog ‚Ä¶

Had an amazing lunch with some friends, great ambiance, service was on point, great recommendations from the waiter on wine and food. We ended up ordering almost all the menu (around two dishes per person) ‚Ä¶

Amazing food, wine and very friendly service. We had the 7-course menu and wine pairing and it was a great experience.
The coffee is sublime.

Incredible interior for a Swede on his way to Sweden. Well incredible for anyone to be honest. Friendly staff, wonderful coffee and cinnamon buns. I would come back as often as I could. Didn't try food as the kitchen was closed.

A very good  and special wine-bar!

Interesting and delicious dishes , great wine list and service at a Michelin star level

A new experience.

Came around lunch time for coffee.
